leads.lead_text: Stems appressed pilose to glabrous; stipules 1–3 mm wide; lower calyx-lobes shorter than calyx tube, sparsely ciliate to subglabrous; pod pubescent
Stems villous; stipules 2–5 mm wide; lower calyx-lobes as long as or longer than calyx tube, densely ciliate; pod glabrous
